name: Free Online SVG Optimization Compression Tool - ATools
description: Free online SVG optimization compression: Remove comments/metadata/title/desc and compress whitespace to generate smaller SVG (pure frontend local processing).
seoDescription: Free online SVG optimization compression tool that supports pasting or uploading SVG and reduces file size by removing comments, metadata, optionally removing title/desc, and simple whitespace compression, with one-click copy and download of optimized SVG. Pure frontend local operation without file uploads, suitable for web icons and illustration resource optimization.

ui.lightWeightDescription: Description: This tool provides lightweight optimization, not equivalent to SVGO's complete rule set; will not change path data and geometric structure.
ui.invalidSvgError: Not a valid SVG (missing <svg> root node).
ui.parseError: SVG parsing failed: Please check if XML is complete.
ui.defaultSvgExample:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="120" height="120" viewBox="0 0 120 120">
  <!-- comment -->
  <metadata>example</metadata>
  <rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="100" fill="#3B82F6"/>
</svg>
